title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations               Permits & Reservations       Special Use Permits There are several types of special use permits necessary for certain activities or events held at Mount Rushmore National Memorial. The links below provide information regarding such permits. You can make payments for permit applications online by visiting https://pay.gov/paygov/. Enter "Mount Rushmore" into the search box at the top of the page and click on "Search" to display a list of our payment forms.   Primary point of contact: Staci Burchett 605-574-3131 or e-mail us Fax number: 605-574-2307 During 2016, no permits will be approved for special events, weddings, filming or photography during the following dates:   June 30 through July 5, 2016, for Independence Day events August 6 through 13, 2016, during the Sturgis Motorcycle Rally  As of August, 2014, the Carver's Cafe and Carver's Cafe Patio will not be able to make reservations or requests for private dinners or receptions between the beginning of Memorial Day weekend and the end of Labor Day weekend.   Use the links below to find information regarding special use permits: Special Events   Weddings   Filming and Photography   First Amendment Activities   Research Permits Research permits are handled through the National Park Service Research Permit and Reporting System.
